thread.section_title: NUO Hotel Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: THE BEST HOTEL!!!!
thread.title_full: THE BEST HOTEL!!!! - Review of NUO Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Mohd M
title: THE BEST HOTEL!!!!
text: Had a chance to stay for 3 nights and the experience is unforgetable. Friendly and helpful staff. The room is super comfortable and excellent. The buffet breakfast is delicious and plenty of choices to go around. It will be even greater if there is Halal Meat for the muslim. Nevertheless, the memory will last forever. Definitely highly recommended.
